subject: Football
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Jim Mora, 50, will take over the Bruins, replacing the fired Rick Neuheisel. Texas A&M also hired a coach, choosing Houston’s Kevin Sumlin.
snippet: Jim Mora, 50, will take over the Bruins, replacing the fired Rick Neuheisel. Texas A&M also hired a coach, choosing Houston’s Kevin Sumlin.
